title: Shield easel

properties.name: description
properties.value: The shield easel can be built in the Heraldry space of the Workshop in a player-owned house. It requires 41 Construction to build and when built, it gives 240 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Shield easel
Shield easel

The shield easel can be built in the Heraldry space of the Workshop in a player-owned house. It requires 41 Construction to build and when built, it gives 240 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

The player can colour steel full helms, adamant full helms, rune full helms, steel kiteshields, adamant kiteshields, and rune kiteshields in their family's crest colours on the easel.

The '''shield easel''' can be built in the [[Heraldry space]] of the [[Workshop]] in a [[player-owned house]]. It requires 41 [[Construction]] to build and when built, it gives 240 [[experience]]. The player must have a [[hammer]] and a [[saw]] in their inventory to build it.

The player can colour [[steel full helm]]s, [[adamant full helm]]s, [[rune full helm]]s, [[steel kiteshield]]s, [[adamant kiteshield]]s, and [[rune kiteshield]]s in their family's crest colours on the easel.
